TopicTitle: mods ksp needs: if you make mods please make some of these!!)

Articles.Content:
post on this thread and hopefully mod makers will make some mods you want.

i want a mod where you have those hover-formula one cars from wipeout games for the ps1,2 and 3.

Moved to General Add-on Affairs, where requests for mods are made.

You should check out Kerbal Foundaries, which will let you build your own hovercraft.

This: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/87546-0-90-Rovers-And-Roadsters-v0-4-Get-Your-Brrrrrmmm-On has a bunch of ground vehichle parts that could satisfy your request. I don't use that mod myself, but when I saw your post, I thought of that mod.

it won't work on my computer
